>
> or just pick {{champion:82}} into assassins and watch them cry

I fail to see how he counters assassins.

Could you perhaps provide an explanation?

His passive allows him to mitigate any of their poke damage using his E, and his W and Ult gives him unexpected burst heal if they all in him. If the assassin stays in his range he will out dps them with Q and W and finish them off using Phase Rush to stick to them. Morde also can easily shove them under tower and prevent them from roaming, forcing them to blow all their mana to cs. The only danger for Morde is if he gets cheese killed at lv 1-2 and the assassin gets 2~ levels on him, but that is easy to avoid if you just play safe until 3.
